attributes.title: Om Is Sound of The Expanding Universe And Shiva Is Sound Of The Acceleration
attributes.description:
31 JULY 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM KAILASA:

*UNIVERSE, COSMOS, IS NOT ONLY EXPANDING, THE EXPANSION IS ACCELERATED.

*I AM REVEALING AS PARAMASHIVA, MAHADEVA IS REVEALING TO ME.

*ONE OF THE GREATEST QUALITIES I ENJOY ABOUT MYSELF IS, I DON’T HAVE STRATEGIES! WHAT HE REVEALS I REVEAL AND AFTER IT FLOWS AND BECOMES REALITY, I CAN SEE HIS VISION AND I AM ALSO ENJOYING THE VISION OF PARAMASHIVA ALONG WITH YOU!

*I KNOW THE VISION OF PARAMASHIVA, BUT I DON’T HAVE A STRATEGY OTHER THAN HIS VISION.

*SO I CAN BE ABSOLUTELY COMPLETE, SINCERE TO THESE TWO STATEMENTS: 1) I LOVE YOU ALL SINCERELY. I LIVED, LIVING, WILL LIVE JUST AS A PURE TRANSPARENT MANIFESTATION OF PARAMASHIVA WITHOUT HAVING ANY ADDITION, DELETION, STRATEGIES NOTHING, JUST SIMPLE PARAMASHIVA STRAIGHT AWAY, STRAIGHT FORWARD. I CAN STAND BETWEEN YOU AND PARAMASHIVA AND DECLARE MY INTEGRITY TO BOTH OF YOU AT THE SAME TIME.

*STRATEGILESS VISIONARY IS THE DEFINITION OF ME.

* I JUST REVEAL WHAT PARAMASHIVA REVEALS. PARAMASHIVA IS VERY CLEARLY EXPRESSING NOW, DURING THIS PRALAYA.THAT NOT ONLY UNIVERSE IS EXPANDING, THE EXPANSION IS ACCELERATED.

*HE ALSO SHOWED ME THE VERBAL MANIFESTATION, HOW THE EXPANSION IS ACCELERATED.

*OM IS THE EXPANSION. THE SOUND OF THE UNIVERSE IS OM, OM, OM, OM….AND THE ACCELERATION OF THIS EXPANSION IS SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA…

*ALL OF YOU HUMAN BEINGS HAVE BINARY EXISTENCE LIKE INHALING-EXHALING, LIFE-DEATH.

* LET SHIVA BE YOUR BINARINESS. SHI - INHALING, VA - EXHALING...SHI - LIFE, VA-DEATH.

*THIS PRANA SAMANA - INHALING EXHALING - LIFE AND DEATH, EVERYTHING, THE BINARY HAPPENING IN YOU, MASCULINE AND FEMININE IN YOU, IS SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA….THIS IS THE SOUND OF THE COSMOS HAPPENING NOW, AT PRESENT.

* ‘OM’ IS THE PHYSICS, THE EXISTENTIAL REALITY OF THE UNIVERSE BY ITS VERY NATURAL EXPANDING QUALITY, TENDENCY.

*SHIVA IS THE VIBRATION OF ACCELERATION HAPPENING IN THIS EXPANSION.

* SO JUST GO ON BE SITTING IN THAT SPACE. WHEN YOU ARE SITTING IN THIS SPACE OF SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, THAT ACCELERATED EXPANSION OF THE UNIVERSE STARTS HAPPENING IN YOU AND YOU GET THE STIMULUS PACKAGE FROM COSMOS.

*NOT ONLY THE GOVERNMENT, BUT EVEN COSMOS IS GIVING A POWERFUL STIMULUS PACKAGE FOR PEOPLE TO GET SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH AND GET ENLIGHTENED IN THIS PRALAYA.

*TO THAT A LARGE CHUNK OF THE STIMULUS PACKAGE TO MANIFEST INTENSE POWERS, LOVE, KNOWLEDGE, ENLIGHTENMENT, A BIG SHARE PARAMASHIVA IS PUSHING ON HUMANITY.

*IN A VERY SIMPLE WAY, SIT AS MUCH TIME AS YOU CAN...YOU DON’T EVEN NEED A SEPARATE TIME...INCLUDING FALLING ASLEEP, YOU CAN BE INSIDE VIBRATING. DON'T CHANT, VIBRATE.

*REMEMBERING AND FORGETFULNESS ARE BOTH YOUR BINARY EXISTENCE LIKE INHALING AND EXHALING, LIKE PARAMASHIVA-PARASHAKTI.

*YOUR EXISTENCE, UNDERSTANDINGS, EXPERIENCE OF LIFE, REALISATION IS BINARY. YOU ACT, YOU LIVE, YOUR SILENCE AND TALKING, EVERYTHING IS BINARY. SO LET YOUR CORE EXPERIENCE OF BINARY BECOME SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA….

*ALONG WITH YOUR DAY-TO-DAY ACTIVITY, LET THIS SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA BECOME THE UNDERCURRENT OF YOU FOR THIS PRALAYA PERIOD.

* I AM NOT TELLING YOU TO DO THIS SHIVA, SHIVA YOUR WHOLE LIFE. YOU WILL NEVER DO. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN THAT. DO FOR PRALAYA ALONE. IF YOU WANT COSMIC STIMULUS CHEQUE OF POWERS, ENLIGHTENMENT, EVERYTHING, JUST REVERBERATE YOURSELF WITH SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA…

*I AM STANDING IN FRONT OF MAHAKALABHAIRAVA AND KEEPING HIM AS WITNESS, AND BEING TRUE TO SARASWATI WHO IS SITTING ON MY TONGUE AND BEING TRUE TO PARAMASHIVA MANIFESTING IN THIS BEING, I AM TELLING YOU: JUST DO THIS: SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA….

*IF YOU ARE FEELING RESTLESS OR BORED OR TIRED, CHANGE THE RHYTHM IN THE CHANTING BUT NOT THE CORE EXISTENCE OF YOUR BEING. RAGA, TALA, PALLAVI, EVEN TUNE CAN CHANGE BUT DON’T CHANGE THE SCRIPT! EVEN WHILE YAWNING, CHANT SHIVA.

*IF YOU HAVE ATMALINGA, KEEP IT IN YOUR BAG. IF YOU HAVE LARGE JATA LIKE MINE, PUT IT IN YOUR JATA.

*IN HINDU KINGDOMS THEY USED TO WEAR THE ATMA LINGA AS THEIR CROWN. VAISHANVITES WILL WEAR THE SADARI AS THE CROWN. SHIVA, SHIVA, SHIVA….

*WHOLE COSMOS IS VIBRATING - GANGA, YAMUNA, KAILASH, HIMALAYAS, TIRUVANNAMALAI…..

*VAYU DEVA IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR BEING


READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4170970589657426
